name: Sakura Chiyo (Gekkan Shoujo Nozaki-kun) LORA
description:
LoRA for Chiyo Sakura from Gekkan Shoujo Nozaki-kun.

Use the "polka dot bow" tag to help generate her big hair ribbons.

I use strength 0.7 for consistent results, but it can do well from 0.5-1

meta.prompt: ((masterpiece)), (best quality), (detailed), (chibi), chiyo_sakura, polka dot bow, school uniform, blazer, smile, blush, happy, eyes closed, <lora:chiyo-20:0.7>
meta.negativePrompt: (worst quality, low quality, easynegative, ng_deepnegative_v1_75t:1.4), (censored, mosaic censoring, bar censor, convenient censoring, pointless censoring:1.0),(jpeg artifacts:1.4),greyscale, monochrome, trembling, text, title, logo, signature, (bad anatomy:1.2),
